scripts.test: npm run test:migration && npm run test:load-envs  -- jest -- --passWithNoTests --runInBand
scripts.test:migration: npm run test:load-envs prisma migrate dev --schema ./prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.test:seed: npm run test:load-envs prisma db seed --schema ./prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.dev:migration:run: npm run dev:load-envs -- prisma migrate deploy --schema ./prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.dev:migration:generate: npm run dev:load-envs prisma migrate dev --schema ./prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.dev:seed: npm run dev:load-envs prisma db seed --schema ./prisma/schema.prisma
